thread.title: Bruce: Weekend kicks off cold streak, no rain expected until lat
thread.title_full: Bruce: Weekend kicks off cold streak, no rain expected until lat - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Weekend kicks off cold streak, no rain expected until lat
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Today will be the last 90 degree day for a while.
Our next cold front arrives early on Saturday morning increasing winds and knocking down our highs by 10-to-15 degrees. Morning lows will drop into the 40s on the north shore and 50s on the south shore Highs will remain in the lower to middle 70s over the weekend.
No rain is expected with this front and our current dry streak (17 days) will last into next week. Late next week could turn wetter bringing welcomed rainfall for our lawns and gardens.
Follow me on Twitter: @Bruce KatzFOX8
